alfredsnippet.snippet:
{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
  "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema",
  "fields": [
    {
      "name": "seller_identifier",
      "type": {
        "type": "record",
        "name": "seller_identifier",
        "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
        "fields": [
          {
            "name": "product_id",
            "type": "string",
            "presentationName": "FSN",
            "description": "Catalog product ID"
          },
          {
            "name": "sku_id",
            "type": "string",
            "presentationName": "SKU ID",
            "description": "Seller SKU ID"
          }
        ]
      },
      "presentationName": "Seller Identifier Information",
      "description": "Record keeping information for the sellers' use."
    },
    {
      "name": "tax",
      "type": {
        "type": "record",
        "name": "tax",
        "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
        "fields": [
          {
            "name": "hsn",
            "type": "string",
            "presentationName": "HSN",
            "description": "Harmonized System Number as per GoI"
          }
        ]
      },
      "presentationName": "Tax Information",
      "description": "Relevant tax information."
    },
    {
      "name": "address_label",
      "type": {
        "type": "record",
        "name": "address_label",
        "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
        "fields": [
          {
            "name": "importer_details",
            "type": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": "string"
            },
            "presentationName": "Importer Details",
            "description": "Importer details of the product."
          },
          {
            "name": "country_of_origin",
            "type": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "enum",
                "name": "iso_two_country_codes",
                "namespace": "",
                "symbols": [
                  "PR",
                  "PS",
                  "PT",
                  "PW",
                  "PY",
                  "QA",
                  "AD",
                  "AE",
                  "AF",
                  "AG",
                  "AI",
                  "AL",
                  "AM",
                  "AO",
                  "AQ",
                  "AR",
                  "AS",
                  "AT",
                  "RE",
                  "AU",
                  "AW",
                  "AX",
                  "AZ",
                  "RO",
                  "BA",
                  "BB",
                  "RS",
                  "BD",
                  "BE",
                  "RU",
                  "BF",
                  "BG",
                  "RW",
                  "BH",
                  "BI",
                  "BJ",
                  "BL",
                  "BM",
                  "BN",
                  "BO",
                  "SA",
                  "BQ",
                  "SB",
                  "BR",
                  "SC",
                  "BS",
                  "SD",
                  "BT",
                  "SE",
                  "BV",
                  "SG",
                  "BW",
                  "SH",
                  "SI",
                  "BY",
                  "SJ",
                  "BZ",
                  "SK",
                  "SL",
                  "SM",
                  "SN",
                  "SO",
                  "CA",
                  "SR",
                  "CC",
                  "SS",
                  "CD",
                  "ST",
                  "CF",
                  "SV",
                  "CG",
                  "SX",
                  "CH",
                  "CI",
                  "SY",
                  "SZ",
                  "CK",
                  "CL",
                  "CM",
                  "CN",
                  "CO",
                  "CR",
                  "TC",
                  "TD",
                  "CU"
                ],
                "version": "1.0"
              }
            },
            "presentationName": "Country Of Origin",
            "description": "Country of origin details of the product."
          }
        ]
      },
      "presentationName": "Address Label",
      "description": "Contains the details related origin, import etc about the listing."
    },
    {
      "name": "fulfilment",
      "type": {
        "type": "record",
        "name": "fulfilment",
        "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
        "fields": [
          {
            "name": "services_fulfilled_by",
            "type": "string",
            "presentationName": "Services Fulfilled By",
            "description": "Services Fulfilled for the listing."
          },
          {
            "name": "region_restriction",
            "type": "string",
            "presentationName": "Region Restriction",
            "description": "Region Restriction for the listing."
          }
        ]
      },
      "presentationName": "Fulfilment Information",
      "description": "Relevant Fulfilment information."
    },
    {
      "name": "order_policy",
      "type": [
        "null",
        {
          "type": "record",
          "name": "order_policy",
          "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
          "fields": [
            {
              "name": "independent_sellable",
              "type": "boolean",
              "presentationName": "Independently Sellable?",
              "description": "Whether this product can be sold independently."
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "default": null,
      "presentationName": "Order Policies",
      "description": "Policies to control the customer order experience."
    },
    {
      "name": "price",
      "type": {
        "type": "record",
        "name": "price",
        "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.fk_service_listing_stagecopy",
        "fields": [
          {
            "name": "selling_price",
            "type": {
              "type": "record",
              "name": "money",
              "namespace": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.datatypes",
              "fields": [
                {
                  "name": "amount",
                  "type": "int"
                },
                {
                  "name": "currency",
                  "type": "string",
                  "default": "INR"
                }
              ]
            },
            "presentationName": "Selling Price",
            "description": "The selling price offered to customers."
          },
          {
            "name": "mrp",
            "type": "com.flipkart.marketplace.listings.schema.datatypes.money",
            "presentationName": "MRP",
            "description": "The mrp of the product."
          }
        ]
      },
      "presentationName": "Price",
      "description": "Define the pricing parameters for your listing."
    }
  ],
  "version": "1.0"
}
alfredsnippet.name: saal schema json - stage
